benchmark_details.name: QuantumLLMInstruct (QLMMI)
benchmark_details.overview: QuantumLLMInstruct (QLMMI) is a dataset featuring over 500,000 meticulously curated instruction-following problem-solution pairs for quantum computing. It significantly improves LLM performance in addressing complex quantum computing challenges across various quantum physics topics.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To generate a high-quality dataset that can serve as a foundational resource for both academic and industrial research in quantum computing.

data.source: Generated from over 90 primary seed domains and incorporating advanced reasoning techniques.
data.annotation: Generated automatically with validation by a Judge LLM.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated through validation stages by a Judge LLM implementing self-critique techniques.
methodology.interpretation: High-quality entries are defined as correctly solved problems with validated solutions.
methodology.validation: The dataset is validated through a zero-shot Judge LLM performing self-assessments.
